body:
I can't reproduce with gomote and lots of iterations:

```
bradfitz@dev-bradfitz:~/go/src$ gomote run user-bradfitz-openbsd-amd64-gce58-0 go/bin/go test -run=TestDevNullFile -count=50000 os
ok      os      11.406s
bradfitz@dev-bradfitz:~/go/src$ gomote run user-bradfitz-openbsd-amd64-gce58-0 go/bin/go test -run=TestDevNullFile -count=50000 os
ok      os      9.920s
```
